name: The Great One Hand Challenge
description:
A diverse array of physics problems to be solved with the aid of your mouse controlled hand. Easy to learn and difficult (but possible) to master. You will fail a lot in this game, laughing and cursing in equal measure.Key Features
  • Levels have many solutions. Be creative to find the quickest route through each level.
  • Think about game mechanics in new ways as you discover the properties of special objects involved in mind opening puzzles.
  • Complete levels faster to earn more magic cubes, unlocking more areas of the exhibition, and ultimately discovering it's psychological secret.
  • Play to a sublime soundtrack including Bach's Goldberg Variations and Chopin's Etudes.
